name: gd-sprest
description: An easy way to develop against the SharePoint REST API.
author: Gunjan Datta <me@dattabase.com> (https://gunjandatta.github.io/sprest)

scripts.build-es2015: tsc --outFile dist/gd-sprest.js && npx babel build/gd-sprest.js --out-file dist/gd-sprest.js --presets=es2015
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run build-lib && npm run build-es2015 && npm run minify
